item.title: SSH Configuration
item.description: Client # generate public / private keys $ ssh-keygen -b 4096 -t rsa -C comments -f ~/.ssh/abc # copy public key to server $ ssh-copy-id -i ~/.ssh/abc.pub root@192.168.1.200 # ssh-agent && ssh-add $ ssh-add ~/.ssh/abc # ssh-add -l check $ ssh-add -l Server # add user A [root@hostname ~] # adduser A # set password for user A [root@hostname ~] # passwd A # add user A to group `wheel` [root@hostname ~] # gpasswd -a A wheel Login # Login with ssh -o PubkeyAuthentication=yes root@192.
